title: Rahu Transit in the 2nd House for Scorpio Ascendant
summary: When Rahu transits the 2nd house for Scorpio Ascendant, focus intensifies on money, speech, and personal values with an unconventional edge. Ambition to increase income grows sharply, often through non-traditional or experimental means. Speech can become persuasive yet inconsistent, requiring caution to avoid misunderstandings. Family dynamics may feel unusual or unstable. Sudden gains and losses are possible, making financial discipline essential. When guided by ethics and clarity, this transit can transform earning patterns and value systems.

sections.title: Career
points: Sales, media, or trading roles activate

closing: This Rahu transit reshapes money and values through experimentation. With discipline and ethics, it can unlock powerful new earning potential.
